description:
Taking place two years before the Straw Hats reunite at Sabody, while training Hancock’s sisters, Marigold and Sandersonia are kidnapped by Byrnndi World, a level 6 inmate of Impel Down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Piece "3D2Y" Überwinde Ace`s Tod - Das Gelübde der Kameraden
One Piece "3D2Y": Ace no Shi o Koete! Luffy Nakama to no Chikai
One Piece "3D2Y": Overcoming Ace`s Death! The Oath with Luffy`s Crewmates!
